001/**  
002 * This controller provides functionality for the manager's control over the menu and to view the menu items
003 * @author Isha Virk
004 */
005package src.controller;
006
007import src.controller.useful_functions.user_role;
008import src.model.product;
009
010import static src.controller.useful_functions.current_user_role;
011import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
012
013import java.util.List;
014
015import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
016import javafx.fxml.FXML;
017import javafx.scene.control.Button;
018import javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent;
019import javafx.scene.layout.VBox;
020
021import src.data.productData;
022import src.model.product;
023
024
025public class view_menu_items_controller {
026    /**
027     * This function handles the button click action to switch back to the menu page
028     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
029     */
030    @FXML
031    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
032        switch_scene("GUI/menu_items_page.fxml", event);
033    }
034
035    /**
036     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the menu items page
037     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
038     */
039    @FXML
040    private void handle_menu_click(MouseEvent event) {
041        switch_scene("GUI/menu_items_page.fxml", event);
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the inventory page
046     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
047     */
048    @FXML
049    private void handle_inventory_click(MouseEvent event) {
050        switch_scene("GUI/inventory_page.fxml", event);
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the sales page
055     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
056     */
057    @FXML
058    private void handle_sales_click(MouseEvent event) {
059        switch_scene("GUI/sales_page.fxml", event);
060    }
061    
062     /**
063     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the menu items page
064     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
065     */
066    @FXML
067    private void handle_view_menu(ActionEvent event) {
068        switch_scene("GUI/view_menu_items.fxml", event);
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the add menu items page (for updating)
073     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
074     */
075    @FXML
076    private void handle_update_menu(ActionEvent event) {
077        switch_scene("GUI/add_menu_item.fxml", event);
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the add inventory page
082     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
083     */
084    @FXML
085    private void handle_add_ing(ActionEvent event) {
086        switch_scene("GUI/add_inventory.fxml", event);
087    }
088
089    /** The FXML container for the drinks */
090    @FXML private VBox drink_container;
091
092
093    /** The FXML container for the toppings */
094    @FXML private VBox topping_container;
095
096
097    /**
098     * This function dynamically fetches the drinks and toppings from the database
099     * to populate the FXML containers
100     */
101    @FXML
102    public void initialize() {
103
104        //Topping Button Insertion and Handler
105        List<product> toppings = productData.getToppings();
106        for (product topping : toppings) {
107            Button btn = new Button(topping.getProductName());
108            btn.setMaxWidth(Double.MAX_VALUE);
109            topping_container.getChildren().add(btn);
110        }
111
112        //Drink Button Insertion and Handler
113        List<product> drinks = productData.getDrinks();
114        for (product drink : drinks) {
115            Button drinkBtn = new Button(drink.getProductName());
116            drinkBtn.setMaxWidth(Double.MAX_VALUE);
117            // btn.setOnAction(e -> handleToppingSelection(topping)); // on click should show drink and ingredients
118            drink_container.getChildren().add(drinkBtn);
119        }
120    }
121}
